summary:
Here is a summarized version of the Security Council document:

The Security Council:
- Reaffirms previous resolutions on Afghanistan, sovereignty, independence and territorial integrity.
- Pledges continued support to the Government and people of Afghanistan.
- Endorses the "Afghanistan Compact" as a framework for partnership between the Afghan Government and the international community.
- Calls for full implementation of the Compact by the Afghan Government, international community and organizations.
- Affirms the central role of the UN in Afghanistan, including coordination of Compact implementation.
- Welcomes the interim Afghanistan National Development Strategy and financial pledges.
- Recognizes risks from opium cultivation and trafficking, welcomes the National Drug Control Strategy.
- Acknowledges NATO's commitment to lead the International Security Assistance Force (ISAF).
- Declares willingness to take further action to support Compact implementation.
- Decides to remain seized of this matter.
